department: Public Works and Governement Services Canada
short_summary: Supply all labour, materials (including waste factors), equipment, transportation and supervision nessesary for roof repairs at the Department of National Defence (DND) 4 Wing Cold Lake in Cold Lake, Alberta
description: Roof Repairs Standing Offer, Wing 4 Cold Lake, AB. Supply all labour, materials (including waste factors), equipment, transportation and supervision necessary to carry out repair and maintenance to various roofs on an "as and when requested" basis by the Department of National Defence (DND) 4 Wing Cold Lake in Cold Lake, AB in the form of call-ups for provision of roof repairs. Cannabis industry requirements shall be met while conducting services. Procurement contains mandatory requirements. Security requirements, including security screening of personnel, are associated with this procurement. Lowest Price
full_summary:
**Roof Repairs Standing Offer**
**W6895-200058/B**
**CFB 4 Wing Cold Lake, Alberta**

The Department of National Defence (DND) 4 Wing Cold Lake, Alberta, has issued a Request for Proposal for a Roof Repairs Standing Offer. The successful bidder will provide roofing and waterproofing services for various roofs at CFB 4 Wing Cold Lake.

**Tender Details:**

*   **Trade Agreement:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   **Tendering Method:** Competitive – Open Bidding
*   **Evaluation Criteria:** Lowest Price
*   **Comprehensive Land Claim Agreement:** No
*   **Nature of Requirements:** Roof Repairs for DND 4 Wing Cold Lake

**Eligibility Requirements:**

*   Interested suppliers are eligible to submit a bid
*   The contractor must have expertise in roofing and waterproofing services

**Proposal Requirements:**

*   The bid shall include the contractor's qualifications, experience, and a detailed proposal for the roofing and waterproofing services
*   The contractor must demonstrate their ability to meet the requirements of the project

**Timeline:**

*   **Publication Date:** September 6, 2022
*   **Tender Closing Date:** September 20, 2022, at 16:00

**Interested Bidders:**

Please submit your proposal electronically to the Western Region Bid Receiving Unit's generic email address: [roreceptionSoumissions.wrbidreceiving@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:roreceptionSoumissions.wrbidreceiving@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Contact Information:**

*   **Victoria Lee**
+   **Procurement Officer**
+   **Western Region Bid Receiving Unit**
+   **Phone:** (780) 782-0124
+   **Fax:** (418) 566-6167
+   **Email:** [victoria.lee@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca](mailto:victoria.lee@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca)

The Crown reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada. All contact information can be found on the Government Tender Website. 

I am glad that the matter has been put forward in a clear concise manner as requested. Only professional information and runner were included for the tender. Any confusion of specific metrics are resolved to feelings of clarity for the project as
